roleset.name: generate and releases substance, release substance
roleset.note: SECRETE-V NOTES: No Verbnet entry. Compared to 'emit'. frameset created by Jena. (from secrete.01-v)

example.name: active
example.text: It secretes the largest quantity of venom of any Taiwanese snake.
example.arg: the largest quantity of venom of any Taiwanese snake

example.name: Both args
example.text: The liver's importance to the digestive system is its secretion of bile salts.
